class.description: This is a plugin driver for etasl for simple_kinematic_simulation.
This is a plugin for a twist input handler (read geometry_msgs/Twist.msg ROS2 msgs).
This is a plugin for a wrench input handler (read geometry_msgs/Wrench.msg ROS2 msgs).
This is a plugin for a simple topic input handler (read etasl_interfaces::msg::Input ROS2 msgs).
This is a plugin for a TF input handler (read ROS2 TFs).
This is a plugin for a Joint state output handler (e.g. to visualize in RVIZ).
This is a plugin for a topic output handler (i.e. output several scalar output expressions in one topic).
